description.narrative: Equitable access to quality Health, Nutrition, HIV and AIDS ,and WASH services for children, adolsecvents, youth and women reinforced,, which contributes to Child Health, Health Systems Strengthening, Nutrition And Emergencies, Sanitation, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition, Wash â€“ General. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved equitable access to/utilization of high-quality promotional/preventive/curative/rehabilitative Health, HIV/AIDS, WASH, Nutrition services for children adolescents, youth, women

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
